channel.title: CiTR -- St.Tropez
channel.description: 1960's - French Pop, Psychedelia, Sunshine Pop, Bubblegum, Brit Folk, Soul, Garage & More! 1970's - Punk, Post Punk, New Wave, Disco, Glam 1980's - more New Wave, Synth Pop 1990's to NOW - Indie Indie Indie & Britpop Every 2nd Sunday From 5-6 pm
channel.itunes:summary: 1960's - French Pop, Psychedelia, Sunshine Pop, Bubblegum, Brit Folk, Soul, Garage & More! 1970's - Punk, Post Punk, New Wave, Disco, Glam 1980's - more New Wave, Synth Pop 1990's to NOW - Indie Indie Indie & Britpop Every 2nd Sunday From 5-6 pm
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver
channel.itunes:subtitle: Underrated music from several decades!

item.title: Broadcast on 05-Oct-2008
item.description: SPECIAL THEME SHOW!: Christine's teenage rock 'n roll crushes from the 80's. songlist: 1.absolute-SCRITTI POLITTI (1985) (Green Gartside!) 2.icing on the cake-STEPHEN 'TIN TIN' DUFFY (1985) (Stephen Duffy!) 3.sound of thunder-DURAN DURAN (1981) (John Taylor!) 4.the hurting-TEARS FOR FEARS (1983) (Curt Smith!) 5.we could send letters-AZTEC CAMERA (1983) (Roddy Frame!) 6.marine boy-HAIRCUT 100 (1982) (Nick Heyward!) 7.the bitterest pill (i ever had to swallow) -THE JAM (1982) (Paul Weller!) 8.i believe in you-TALK TALK (1988) (Mark Hollis!/Lee Webb!) 9.the hanging garden-THE CURE (1982) (Robert Smith!) 10.let me go-HEAVEN 17(1983) (Glenn Gregory!) THERE ARE MORE BUT I RAN OUT OF TIME! ;)
item.itunes:subtitle: Christine's teenage rock 'n roll crushes
